description:
Completed just now in 2022 by Modulus Construction, these designer Torrens titled residences offer contemporary living with wonderful everyday convenience in Athelstone.

Set on tree-lined Fox Ave, these three statement homes rise over the street with angular facades seamlessly integrated render, timber and stone for an Architectural look.

Enjoy luxurious features such as 3m ceilings throughout (with even loftier 3.3m ceilings to the living), a second lounge room, and high quality timber look floors.

An impressive open plan living space offers a modern kitchen, spacious dining and generous lounge, with large windows framing the private garden beyond.

Abundant in glossy cabinetry and Calacatta Stone benchtops, the sleek kitchen comes together under the pendant feature lighting of the island bar. Keeping your space neat and tidy, a massive butler's pantry and laundry beyond conceal a dishwasher and sink, and plenty more storage.

Alfresco dining is a breeze on Fox. Wrapped in good neighbour fencing, you've a truly private outdoor retreat. An outdoor kitchen includes a sink, storage, tiled splashback, and space for your BBQ and a fridge, pre-empting quiet nights at home and easy entertaining alike.

When it comes to sleeping quarters, on the front of each home, a main bedroom includes a well-sized walk-through robe and well-appointed private ensuite bathroom with statement floor-to-ceiling tiling and feature LED lighting.

Tucked cleverly off a hallway to create a sleeping wing, two bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and the comfort of carpet. They share use of the main bathroom, complete with a back-to-wall freestanding bath and more chic feature tiling.

These sparkling new homes presents so much all-rounder appeal, with everything you need within arm's reach from this wonderful suburban location!

Embrace reinvigorating weekend hikes through Black Hill Conservation Park and Thorndon Park Reserve, while you're walking distance to public transport, great local schools and Athelstone Shopping Mall, including Foodland, bakeries, cafes and takeaway.

More features to love:
- 3 meters high ceilings throughout (with even loftier 3.3m ceilings to the living)
- 2 living areas
- Tinted Double glazing windows
- 60mm Calacatta stone Island benchtop & 30m Calacatta stone benchtops throughout
- Secured double garage
- Carparking up to 3/4 cars and further off-street parking
- Exposed aggregate driveway and surrounds
- Daikin Reverse cycle ducted A/C with zone touch controls & liner vents to living
- Composite 'Timber Look' eaves
- Secure alarm system
- Gas hot water system
- Irrigated front garden and low maintenance rear garden
- Zoned to Charles Campbell College and walking distance to St Ignatius' College, Athelstone Primary and Preschool
- Easy access to public transport along Gorge Road
- Just over 10km to the Adelaide CBD

Year Built: 2022
Title: Torrens
Equivalent Building Area: 225 sqm (approx.)
Land Size: 389sqm (approx.)
Council: City of Campbelltown
Council Rates: TBA
SA Water: TBA
ES Levy: TBA
Rental Appraisal: TBA

Disclaimer: all information provided has been obtained from sources we believe to be accurate, however, we cannot guarantee the information is accurate and we accept no liability for any errors or omissions. If this property is to be sold via auction the Vendors Statement may be inspected at Level 1, 67 Anzac Highway, Ashford for 3 consecutive business days and at the property for 30 minutes prior to the auction commencing. RLA 315571.
